author: hustla187
title: Cool Idea
review: I really like the idea of a set with a boat and a wakeboarder. However, this isn't what I had in mind. The speedboat could be slightly improved on and the rope is a little too long. Besides that, this is a cool set.

author: Berrus_Brickus
title: What idiot puts a criminal in charge of a competition?
review:
This was my first IXS sets, and back in the day was one of my favorite themes.

 

  • Pros:
  • *Brickster's boat
  • *Better cones (compared to Snap's Cruisser)
  • *Nice wake board system
  • *Surf board
  • *Brickster
  • *Sky Lane (not that I really like her, she is nicely done though)

 

  • Cons:
  • *Sticker on board
  • *Who goes wakeboarding in a sweatshirt (Sky Lane apparently)
  • *Box conntinuity problems-sometimes there is a road wear the river is, and somtimes the river goes a different way
  • *What idiot puts a criminal in charge of a competition?
